description: Add Basic Authentication to your APIs, with username and password protection. The plugin will check for valid credentials in the Proxy-Authorization and Authorization header (in this order).

hide_credentials.description: An optional boolean value telling the plugin to hide the credential to the upstream API server. It will be removed by the API Gateway before proxying the request.

anonymous.description: An optional string (consumer uuid) value to use as an "anonymous" consumer if authentication fails. If empty (default), the request will fail with an authentication failure 4xx.
